supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals Domestic Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name, 'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_W')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals Electricity Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and not(local-name()='AgSupplySector') and not(@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water') and not(@name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='industry') and not(@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat') and not (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_W')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals Manufacturing Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and contains(@name, 'industr')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_W')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals Mining Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_W')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Withdrawals Livestock Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_W')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Consumption Domestic Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name, 'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_C')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Consumption Electricity Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and not(local-name()='AgSupplySector') and not(@name='domestic water' or @name='municipal water') and not(@name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='industry') and not(@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat') and not (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_C')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Consumption Manufacturing Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and contains(@name, 'industr')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_C')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Consumption Mining Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (contains(@name, 'regional coal') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenIII') or contains(@name, 'regional natural gas') or contains(@name, 'unconventional oil production') or contains(@name, 'regional oil') or contains(@name, 'nuclearFuelGenII'))]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_C')]/demand-physical/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: Water Consumption Livestock Core
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='Beef' or @name='Dairy' or @name='Pork' or @name='Poultry' or @name='SheepGoat')]//*[@type='input' and contains(@name,'water_td') and ends-with(@name, '_C')]/demand-physical/node()
